Some items in Hexen may "contain" something and release it when they are broken. These include {{Class|Pottery1}}, {{Class|Pottery2}}, {{Class|Pottery3}} and {{Class|ZSuitOfArmor}}. To do that, the first argument of the item must be a number corresponding to the item's [[spawn numbers|SpawnID]].
In the [[Universal Doom Map Format]], it is possible to give an actor name in the {{c|arg0str}} property instead to spawn an item which does not have a spawn ID in the current game. [[Category:Actors]][[Category:Glossary]]
